nodes.text: The Sundari Research Grounds was a scientific research facility located in the Sundari Flatlands on Balmorra. Doctors Arick Tamso and Tabo worked at the facility before Colicoids overtook the compound.

The Sundar Research Grounds appear in the Republic version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The area's world-map name is mislabeled as the "Sundar Research Grounds," though mission text and other text elements confirm the correct name.
